languages.text: {n}Скулы Кассии вспыхивают красным, когда до нее доходит смысл собственных слов.{/n} "Я... лишь хотела поделиться статистикой, собранной Эксплоратором Литием-Тета Квондом. Чтобы убедить вас..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Скулы Кассии вспыхивают красным, когда до нее доходит смысл собственных слов.{/n} "Я... лишь хотела поделиться статистикой, собранной эксплоратором Литием-Тета Квондом. Чтобы убедить вас..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅意识到她刚刚说了什么，她的脸也变红了。{/n}“我……只是想分享一下开拓者利希斯·西塔·昆德收集的统计数据，想要说服你……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅意识到她刚刚说了什么，她的脸也变红了。{/n}“我……只是想分享一下开拓者利希斯·西塔·昆德收集的统计数据，想要说服你……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

languages.text: {n}Las mejillas de Cassia se sonrojan al darse cuenta de lo que ha dicho.{/n} «Solo... solo quería compartir las estadísticas recopiladas por el explorador Lithius-Theta Quonde. Para convencerle...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mejillas de Cassia se sonrojan al darse cuenta de lo que ha dicho.{/n} «Solo... solo quería compartir las estadísticas recopiladas por el explorador Lithius-Theta Quonde. Para convencerle...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}言葉を紡ぐと同時に、カシアの頬が赤く染まる。{/n}「私は…探査艦隊リティウス＝シータ・クオンデが集めた統計を共有したかっただけです。あなたを納得させるために…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}言葉を紡ぐと同時に、カシアの頬が赤く染まる。{/n}「私は…探査艦隊リティウス＝シータ・クオンデが集めた統計を共有したかっただけです。あなたを納得させるために…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassias Wangen blühen rot auf, als ihr klar wird, was sie da gerade gesagt hat.{/n} "Ich ... wollte lediglich die Statistiken anführen, die der Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde erhoben hat. Um Euch zu überzeugen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassias Wangen blühen rot auf, als ihr klar wird, was sie da gerade gesagt hat.{/n} "Ich ... wollte lediglich die Statistiken anführen, die der Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde erhoben hat. Um Euch zu überzeugen ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, qui ne s'était pas vraiment rendu compte de ce qu'elle disait, se met à rougir.{/n} « Je... Je voulais simplement partager les statistiques évoquées par l'explorator Lithius-Thêta Quonde afin de vous convaincre... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, qui ne s'était pas vraiment rendu compte de ce qu'elle disait, se met à rougir.{/n} « Je... Je voulais simplement partager les statistiques évoquées par l'explorator Lithius-Thêta Quonde afin de vous convaincre... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Az önce dediklerinin farkına varınca Cassia'nın yanakları kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n} "Şey... Sadece Keşiftör Lithius-Thita Quonde'nin topladığı istatistiksel verileri paylaşmak istemiştim. Seni ikna edebilmek için..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cheeks bloom with red as she realises what she just said.{/n} "I... just wanted to share the statistics gathered by the Explorator Lithius-Theta Quonde. In order to convince you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Az önce dediklerinin farkına varınca Cassia'nın yanakları kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n} "Yani... Sadece Keşiftör Lithius-Thita Quonde'nin topladığı istatistiksel verileri paylaşmak istemiştim. Seni ikna edebilmek için..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
